specsKey: Nikon Coolpix P600 Point & Shoot Camera

extremely good product. 60 x zoom is what attracted me to the product. and also the pricing which is quite affordable considering you want such good zoom. I dnt think any other brand offers it in this price range and Nikon can't be compared to others. Only thing I found a little disheartening was that the autofocus on the subject while zooming is a tad slow compared to other cameras and even compared to Nikon L830 which has 30x zoom. Otherwise its cool. The multivariangle display is cool if you are looking out for a zoom monster and dont want a dslr this is the product to choose

Few days back we visited Singapore and felt that our many of the memorable shots are not coming correctly just because of camera. We did lot of research and found 2 options for myself 1) D SLR 2) Point & Shoot Camera After a detailed research we found Nikon Cool Pix 600 and found value for money and best device in the segment. The level of zoom it has and other capabilities will make you mesmerised. Amazingly superb device for novice users.
After all the confusion of buying an SLR, I would clearly state this is a good point and shoot camera :)

If you are not a professional photographer then this camera is for you. Excellent performance and great delivery by flipkart. If someone has seen moon videos of this camera on youtube..then they dont lie. I managed same quality video from this. Best utility is camera remote control through ipad or android device.. works great
Pros- Lithium-ion battery wi-fi enabled makes easy sharing 60x zoom is very quick and sharp view finder enables to give slr touch Adjustable screen is too good Cons- Sorry
Worth buying camera with super zoom of 60X and cool features for 20K price range.

a very nice camera for the price. it has awesome zoom and very good functions. I wanted a camera only for zoom purpose as I already have a DSLR, so i found this to suit my needs and budget. Only flop side was Flipkart having promised an offer of 8GB card plus camera pouch with the product, and the pouch i received was of some other digital P&S camera, more so of the small sleek types. the pouch hardly measures 4inch by 3inch size, obviously not for p600. Flipkart should note what products they are shipping and what offers they are giving before shipping

Looks to be a good camera.. i received it few days back yet to explore it. Took some pics from it.. appears to be ok with good clarity and zoom. I was dilemna to buy either to go for cannon or nikon finally i bought nikon and hope it stands up to my expectations.

THIS IS NOT A PROFESSIONAL CAMERA... IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR ONE, THEN GO AND BUY AN SLR... FOR LESSER MORTALS... 1. Looks awesome 2. Can be controlled manually. 3. Feels nice. (light) 4. Image quality: suits your basic need 5. Zoom: Monstrous 6. Aperture, Shutter speed: negotiable
My first experience of shopping on flipkart. The order reached fast. The camera is awesome.good discount. Worth buying.
